detaileddescription.para: Relay feature
GATT Proxy feature
Friend feature
Low Power Node feature

briefdescription.para: Register a callback structure for Friendship events.
Register a callback structure for Friendship events.

detaileddescription.para: Registers a callback structure that will be called whenever Friendship gets established or terminated.
Available Provisioning output authentication actions.
Available Provisioning input authentication actions.
Available Provisioning bearers.
Out of Band information location.
This is intended to be called after the bt_mesh_prov input callback has been called with BT_MESH_ENTER_STRING as the action.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: This is intended to be called after the bt_mesh_prov input callback has been called with BT_MESH_ENTER_NUMBER as the action.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.
Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner only.

Instruct the unprovisioned device to use the specified Input OOB authentication action. When using BT_MESH_PUSH, BT_MESH_TWIST or BT_MESH_ENTER_NUMBER, the bt_mesh_prov::output_number callback is called with a random number that has to be entered on the unprovisioned device.
When using BT_MESH_ENTER_STRING, the bt_mesh_prov::output_string callback is called with a random string that has to be entered on the unprovisioned device.

parameterdescription.para: Authentication action used by the unprovisioned device.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner only.
Instruct the unprovisioned device to use the specified Output OOB authentication action. The bt_mesh_prov::input callback will be called.
When using BT_MESH_BLINK, BT_MESH_BEEP, BT_MESH_VIBRATE or BT_MESH_DISPLAY_NUMBER, and the application has to call bt_mesh_input_number with the random number indicated by the unprovisioned device.
When using BT_MESH_DISPLAY_STRING, the application has to call bt_mesh_input_string with the random string displayed by the unprovisioned device.

parameterdescription.para: Authentication action used by the unprovisioned device.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner only.
Instruct the unprovisioned device to use static OOB authentication, and use the given static authentication value when provisioning.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner only.
Don't use any authentication when provisioning new devices. This is the default behavior.

simplesect.para: Not using any authentication exposes the mesh network to impersonation attacks, where attackers can pretend to be the unprovisioned device to gain access to the network. Authentication is strongly encouraged.
Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Enable one or more provisioning bearers.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Disable one or more provisioning bearers.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t net_key[16], uint16_t net_idx, uint8_t flags, uint32_t iv_index, uint16_t addr, const uint8_t dev_key[16])
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_provision

detaileddescription.para: This API should normally not be used directly by the application. The only exception is for testing purposes where manual provisioning is desired without an actual external provisioner.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t uuid[16], uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t attention_duration)

briefdescription.para: Provision a Mesh Node using PB-ADV.

parameterdescription.para: Address to assign to remote device. If addr is 0, the lowest available address will be chosen.
The attention duration to be send to remote device

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t uuid[16], uint16_t net_idx, uint16_t addr, uint8_t attention_duration)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_provision_gatt

briefdescription.para: Provision a Mesh Node using PB-GATT.

parameterdescription.para: Address to assign to remote device. If addr is 0, the lowest available address will be chosen.
The attention duration to be send to remote device

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the local node has been provisioned.

detaileddescription.para: This API can be used to check if the local node has been provisioned or not. It can e.g. be helpful to determine if there was a stored network in flash, i.e. if the network was restored after calling settings_load().

simplesect.para: True if the node is provisioned. False otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: After calling this API, the node will not automatically advertise as unprovisioned, rather the bt_mesh_prov_enable() API needs to be called to enable unprovisioned advertising on one or more provisioning bearers.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Reset the state of the local Mesh node.

detaileddescription.para: Resets the state of the node, which means that it needs to be reprovisioned to become an active node in a Mesh network again.

After calling this API, the node will not automatically advertise as unprovisioned, rather the bt_mesh_prov_enable() API needs to be called to enable unprovisioned advertising on one or more provisioning bearers.

This API can be used for power saving purposes, but the user should be aware that leaving the local node suspended for a long period of time may cause it to become permanently disconnected from the Mesh network. If at all possible, the Friendship feature should be used instead, to make the node into a Low Power Node.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

detaileddescription.para: This API resumes the local node, after it has been suspended using the bt_mesh_suspend() API.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Toggle the IV Update test mode.

detaileddescription.para: This API is only available if the IV Update test mode has been enabled in Kconfig. It is needed for passing most of the IV Update qualification test cases.

parameterdescription.para: true to enable IV Update test mode, false to disable it.

detaileddescription.para: This API is only available if the IV Update test mode has been enabled in Kconfig. It is needed for passing most of the IV Update qualification test cases.

simplesect.para: true if IV Update In Progress state was entered, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Toggle the Low Power feature of the local device.

detaileddescription.para: Enables or disables the Low Power feature of the local device. This is exposed as a run-time feature, since the device might want to change this e.g. based on being plugged into a stable power source or running from a battery power source.

parameterdescription.para: true to enable LPN functionality, false to disable it.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Send out a Friend Poll message.

detaileddescription.para: Send a Friend Poll message to the Friend of this node. If there is no established Friendship the function will return an error.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Terminated Friendship for given LPN.

simplesect.para: Zero on success or (negative) error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Store pending RPL entry(ies) in the persistent storage.

detaileddescription.para: This API allows the user to store pending RPL entry(ies) in the persistent storage without waiting for the timeout.

simplesect.para: When flash is used as the persistent storage, calling this API too frequently may wear it out.

parameterdescription.para: Address of the node which RPL entry needs to be stored or BT_MESH_ADDR_ALL_NODES to store all pending RPL entries.
